title: WinToHDD Enterprise 1.3 (Install + Portable) 64-bit
description:
About this release

- Release date: 22/03/2016
- Install: run installer, copy cracked executable to 'bin' folder within installation directory (runs on 64-bit systems only)
- Portable: registered, just unzip and run executable as (on 64-bit systems only)
- For both versions: run as administrator on 64-bit systems

Changes in Version 1.3 (2016.3.22)

- Clone Windows OS which on a dynamic disk to another disk
- Spanish language support
- Fix other minor bugs

About WinToHDD

Install or reinstall Windows 10/8.1/8/7/vista without CD/DVD or USB drive!

WinToHDD is a handy and useful Windows software that allows you to install or reinstall Microsoft Windows without using a CD/DVD or USB drive.
With this All-in-One Microsoft Windows Setup application, you can easily reinstall Microsoft Windows, install Microsoft Windows onto disks other than the one where your Microsoft Windows operating system is installed, or clone current Windows OS installation (Windows vista or later) to other disk.

Trying to make the Microsoft Windows deployment task as easy as possible, WinToHDD comes with a genuine, clean interface that only uses three buttons: one for re-installing the operating system on the local workstation, one for starting a new Microsoft Windows install on a second device (hard drive), and the third for generating an exact copy of the local system to other disk.

Tips: Install and run Windows operating system on a USB drive, or clone your current Windows OS installation to a USB drive as a portable Windows, please try WinToUSB.

System requirements

- Windows XP or later (32/64-bit).
- IntelÂ® PentiumÂ® processor.
- 512MB of available RAM (1G or more recommended).
- 500MB of free space on your hard drive.
- 1024x768 graphic device (higher resolution recommended).

Homepage http://www.easyuefi.com/wintohdd/index.html
